Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an item that can be purchased. This class supports both individual and bulk pricing models.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Item(java.lang.String name, double price)
      Constructs an item that does not offer bulk pricing.
      Item(java.lang.String name, double price, int bulk_quantity, double bulk_price)
      Constructs an item that offers bulk pricing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the item
      double priceFor(int quantity)
      Calculates the price for a specified quantity of the item, considering bulk pricing.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the item, including its name, price, and bulk pricing details if applicable.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String name,
            double price)
        Constructs an item that does not offer bulk pricing.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item
        price - The price of the item

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String name,
            double price,
            int bulk_quantity,
            double bulk_price)
        Constructs an item that offers bulk pricing.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item
        price - The regular price of the item
        bulk_quantity - The minimum quantity for bulk pricing
        bulk_price - The price per unit when purchased in bulk

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Retrieves the name of the item

      • priceFor

        public double priceFor(int quantity)
        Calculates the price for a specified quantity of the item, considering bulk pricing.
        Parameters:
        quantity - The quantity of items to be purchased
        Returns:
        The total price for the specified quantity of items

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the item, including its name, price, and bulk pricing details if applicable. Example output without bulk pricing: "ItemName, $9.99" Example output with bulk pricing: "ItemName, $9.99 (5 @ $8.99 ea.)"
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string description of the item
